verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of Asaph.<WH623> O God,<WH430> the heathen<WH1471> are come<WH935> into thine inheritance;<WH5159> <WH853> thy holy<WH6944> temple<WH1964> have they defiled;<WH2930> they have laid<WH7760> <WH853> Jerusalem<WH3389> on heaps.<WH5856>

<WH853> The dead bodies<WH5038> of thy servants<WH5650> have they given<WH5414> to be meat<WH3978> unto the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven,<WH8064> the flesh<WH1320> of thy saints<WH2623> unto the beasts<WH2416> of the earth.<WH776>
Their blood<WH1818> have they shed<WH8210> like water<WH4325> round about<WH5439> Jerusalem;<WH3389> and there was none<WH369> to bury<WH6912> them.
We are become<WH1961> a reproach<WH2781> to our neighbors,<WH7934> a scorn<WH3933> and derision<WH7047> to them that are round about<WH5439> us.
How long,<WH5704> <WH4100> LORD?<WH3068> wilt thou be angry<WH599> forever?<WH5331> shall thy jealousy<WH7068> burn<WH1197> like<WH3644> fire?<WH784>

Pour out<WH8210> thy wrath<WH2534> upon<WH413> the heathen<WH1471> that<WH834> have not<WH3808> known<WH3045> thee, and upon<WH5921> the kingdoms<WH4467> that<WH834> have not<WH408> called<WH7121> upon thy name.<WH8034>
For <WH3588> they have devoured<WH398> <WH853> Jacob,<WH3290> and laid waste<WH8074> his dwelling place.<WH5116>
O remember<WH2142> not<WH408> against us former<WH7223> iniquities:<WH5771> let thy tender mercies<WH7356> speedily<WH4116> prevent<WH6923> us: for<WH3588> we are brought very low.<WH1809> <WH3966>

Help <WH5826> us, O God<WH430> of our salvation,<WH3468> for<WH5921> <WH1697> the glory<WH3519> of thy name:<WH8034> and deliver<WH5337> us, and purge away<WH3722> <WH5921> our sins,<WH2403> for thy name's sake.<WH4616> <WH8034>

Wherefore <WH4100> should the heathen<WH1471> say,<WH559> Where<WH346> is their God?<WH430> let him be known<WH3045> among the heathen<WH1471> in our sight<WH5869> by the revenging<WH5360> of the blood<WH1818> of thy servants<WH5650> which is shed.<WH8210>

Let the sighing<WH603> of the prisoner<WH615> come<WH935> before<WH6440> thee; according to the greatness<WH1433> of thy power<WH2220> preserve<WH3498> thou those that are appointed<WH1121> to die;<WH8546>
And render<WH7725> unto our neighbors<WH7934> sevenfold<WH7659> into<WH413> their bosom<WH2436> their reproach,<WH2781> wherewith<WH834> they have reproached<WH2778> thee, O Lord.<WH136>

So we<WH587> thy people<WH5971> and sheep<WH6629> of thy pasture<WH4830> will give thee thanks<WH3034> forever:<WH5769> we will show forth<WH5608> thy praise<WH8416> to all generations.<WH1755> <WH1755>
